CHAPTER 1 CLIMATE AND WEATHER  1
Chapter
1
Climate and 
weather
This chapter covers secondary (regional) and tertiary (local) circulations 
or weather patterns. This knowledge will enable you to analyse weather 
patterns and the microclimate of cities and valleys in the exam.
